website_summaries.verdict: A multi-purpose six-quart pressure cooker that has many user-friendly features and has earned more happy customers than complaints.
pros: Features nine cook settings and a digital control panel with 14 one-touch preset buttons that take the guesswork out of preparing many dishes
Comes with a comprehensive accessory kit and access to Mealthy's app for numerous recipe ideas
cons: A few owners gripe about lost pressure and/or controls that stop working altogether after several months of use

website_summaries.verdict: This is an impressive machine that has functions that rival costlier models. Use it with the Mealthy app for tips and recipes to make the most of its capabilities.
pros: Offers 9 functions and a 14 presets that take the guesswork out making some of your favorite dishes
Clear LCD panel has a progress function that monitors the cooking process
cons: Be sure to use utensils that are safe for non-stick surfaces, as the coating has been known to scratch/peel

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 4 months. Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 months ago and used it a few times. It won't turn on at all now. Of course my window to return with Amazon is over. Update..... Mealthy customer service was great and sent a new pot out within days. Hopefully the new one lasts much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Keenan

customer_reviews.title: It's been great for everything I have made in it
customer_reviews.text: I find I need to make sure the vent areas are cleaned after each use, which means taking the little metal cover off the vent cover inside the lid. If there is any debris where it vents, the pot will not work properly. Other than that, its been great for everything I have made in it.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey M

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review-Great Service
customer_reviews.text: This is an updated review: I originally gave the pot a 1 Star rating due to it failing after 2nd use. I returned it and was going to go with another brand. Mealthy personally reached out to me and apologized and provided me with a new pot that so far has worked great. I was so impressed with the companies personal and professional service that I just had to change my review. Although the first product failed and got a 1 Star, their service was a 5+. Changing my overall opinion to 4 stars. Buy with confidence the Mealthy Multi-pot. Thank you guys for making it right!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Newland

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, easy to use product!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this MultiPot on Tia Mowry's cooking show on YouTube and immediately went to Amazon to buy it! I made the stew that she cooks and it is AMAZING!!! Can't believe how fast this pot cooks tough cuts of meat, and the flavor that it builds in such a short amount of time. I am really blown away. I've already made the Tikka Masala, Chicken Burrito Bowls, and Mashed Potatoes from Mealthy's site. I love their videos.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine E Edelshain

customer_reviews.title: It did not  work
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 pots and send it to kSA to my family but 2 of them didn’t work !!!
customer_reviews.author: Yaser

customer_reviews.title: Durability is extremely poor.
customer_reviews.text: While this works great. I have only had it 4 months and the ceramic coating is already starting to peel as you can see.
customer_reviews.author: Amy & Dustin Doerflinger

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...won't hold pressure
customer_reviews.text: I got this thing, spent all this money and it doesn't seem to work. The pot doesn't hold pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Electronics Broken after three uses
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was great, used it three times and now it won’t turn on or turns on then back off immediately.
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: I guess its edible, it is food
customer_reviews.text: I wasted a lot of food trying to cook in this thing. I wish I had bought it at Walmart, where I could have returned it easily. It will cook meat, and it is food so you can eat it. It just doesn't taste good. Something end up very dry, while others are wet. Yes I followed the Mealthy recipes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AMAZEBALLS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZEBALLS! I literally received it today, and made the BEST split pea soup I have ever made in 30 minutes!!! Normally i would have been slow cooking this ALL DAY!!! I feel like there is magic in that pot... like I’m a good witch who finally earned her magic cauldron!!! What can I make next!?!
customer_reviews.author: Walter Eckhardt

customer_reviews.title: It works ok but things seem to stick to the ...
customer_reviews.text: It works ok but things seem to stick to the bottom no matter if I oil it or spray or don't do anything. I followed the directions. I did not have the issue with the Crock instant pot. I guess it will be a learning curve
customer_reviews.author: Debora R

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best Electric Pressure Cooker!!!
customer_reviews.text: I now own 3 pressure cookers. I started with the Instant pot Duo, 6 qt, the git then Mealthy and now have the Mealthy 2.0. I am ready to give away the Instant brand and just keep the Mealthy cookers. I love the 2.0 and not having to remember to turn the pressure valve. Plus the true slow cooker function of high and LOW is fantastic. Hands down the best Electric Pressure cooker in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Sirbutte

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the MultiPot a few weeks ago. When it came, it didn't even work! I have no idea why didn't work. The product didn't do what it was supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: KB Studio

customer_reviews.title: Paid full price for used item
customer_reviews.text: After un-boxing my "new" Mealthy Multipot, I inspected the items in the box. The inner pot that was included was clearly a used item since there was residue at the bottom of the pot. I assume that the entire unit is used. I'm very unhappy because I paid full price for a new item. As far as I know, there is something wrong with the unit, and that's why it was returned. I plan on returning it, too. Shame on Mealthy for misrepresenting this as a new unit.
customer_reviews.author: DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Multipot
customer_reviews.text: Love the hands free quick release, much safer than conventional way of quick release, great invention, good engineering. This is a quality multipot. Also it arrived 2 days earlier than promised.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H Fern

customer_reviews.title: Will Not Work!
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it in to make my first dish, and the unit does not work. It must be defective because I did not do anything to it.
customer_reviews.author: BiigBuyer710

customer_reviews.title: Electrical Cord missing.
customer_reviews.text: was sick when this came so did not notice until much later that it had no electrical cord to it. Guess I can buy one as it seems pretty standard but shouldn't have to. There was also no manual or recipe book included. Only giving one star because of this but it did have excellent reviews.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after one year
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: mealthy pot customer service reached out to me and offered to send me a brand new one even though I was outside my warranty. The new pot seems to rise up to temperature faster and cook better. I am very happy with how they helped me out. Thank you! Great for one year and 1 month. Used it about 2-3 times a week. But now I have the dreaded error 6, which means my sensor is faulty and I can't use this anymore. Since I'm outside of the 1 year warranty, I can't send this in. I feel like a $100 digital pressure should last longer than one year.
customer_reviews.author: DBLBNBRB

customer_reviews.title: Rivals the Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as gift for a friend who is opening up a healthy clean eating restaurant.. Brought it there for a cooking lesson and she loves it!!. Just as good if not better than my Instant Pot, and Im a die hard fan!. I searched diligently till someone on a FB page posted this product. Very hard to get a comparable one that is reasonably priced and has a stainless steel inner . This one has those points and more!. I'm already recommending it to anyone who would like to start cooking w/ an electric pc.
customer_reviews.author: Froggie Doodle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product. The best thing is how easily it cleans up after use. It's been very easy to use. The display is digital and easy to read. Everything I've cooked in it has turned out perfectly. It also comes with an extra sealing ring, rack, steaming basket, spoon, ladle and silicon mitts. There is an app you can get from the play store that has tons of great recipes. I own 3 instant pot type cookers and this one is by far my favorite one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Out with the boring old recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Mealthy! I have used it a lot since purchasing it and I'm pleased with the quality of my meals. The roasts are delicious and very tender and juicy. I enjoy trying new recipes and my family is enjoying being able to try new varieties. I have mostly cooked beef and chicken meals. I have been pleased with both. The directions found with the product make it easy to have good results with fully cooked meat without drying out the food.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Turner

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly and Super Useful
customer_reviews.text: This pot is great! I have had the Instantpot for about a year now and thought it would be nice to have another one for making desert or a side dish while dinner was cooking! The Mealthy Pot wins in a side by side test! It comes to pressure quicker, the buttons are easier to understand and the extras that it comes with takes it to a whole new level! It’s nice to not have my cake smell like spaghetti with the extra ring! The slow cooker function has allowed me to get rid of my crock pot! I highly recommend this pressure cooker!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Jo Niccum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: My original Mealthy almost made it through hurricane Michael, where as the rest of my house didn’t, but sadly the water got into the pot and destroyed the electrical components. I contacted customer support and they were amazing to deal with and extremely generous in sending me a replacement unit in an effort to try and help me get some semblance of my life back together.
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: No Longer Builds Up Enough Pressure To Seal
customer_reviews.text: ***update*** Mealthy went overboard on customer service for this issue - including sending out a new pressure cooker - unexpected and unasked for so I am pretty pleased They also asked to have the old one sent back (which they included a prepaid shipping label for) so they could find out what the problem is - I was a little quick to hand off the thing to my neighbor to get it recycled Worked great for about a year but did expect it to last a while longer despite times being what they are - Will certainly get another one as I found it very useful - just not this particular one
customer_reviews.author: K. Tallman

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this every day I've had it so far. LOVE IT! Tons of features (still learning all of them). Also, it is built really well and easy to clean. If you are looking for a pressure cooker THIS. IS. THE. ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Try different things until you're comfortable with temps and pressure.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the pressure cooker. I've learned to use this a little better and I'm comfortable using the custom settings available. Frozen chicken literally falls apart with Low Temp / High Pressure for 1.5 hours (I did 3 large breasts). Pot Roast, never more simple. I recommend cooking the meat halfway with same settings above, then adding veggies. Overall, it's the best pressure cooker I've used and very easy to clean. I plan on getting one for my Dad for Christmas, he's pretty amazing...much better than the pressure cooker. Just saying. :)
customer_reviews.author: Thatsthegoodstuff

customer_reviews.title: Just follow directions explicitly.
customer_reviews.text: Neatest kitchen tool I've ever had. I am having a whale of a good time trying recipes-Kindle has a lot of cookbooks under Kindle Unlimited. So far my only disaster was baked beans. Regardless of the recipe, you MUST soak them first. Easy to use. New York cheesecake is the best I've ever had...beef cooks to melt in your mouth tender in minutes. I could go on and on but you get the picture. The cooker came with a trivet, steamer basket, rice paddle and small ladle as well as two handy silicone mitts. I've bought bowls, a bundt pan and a spring form pan because you are limited to about 7 inches of pot.
customer_reviews.author: old vermonter

customer_reviews.title: A Great Addition To My Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I was toying with the idea of buying an electric pressure cooker for a while when I saw an Instant Pot Ultra Plus at Costco and almost bought it that day but decided instead to go home and research it first. My research led me to believe that a Mealthy Multi Pot was the best deal out there in terms of quality and value and after a few meals in I am convinced I made a great choice. It makes great dishes with minimum fuss. My cast iron Dutch ovens are going to get dusty sitting on the shelf this winter.
customer_reviews.author: J.Q.P.

customer_reviews.title: A wonder appliance!
customer_reviews.text: Mealthy Multipot, where have you been all my life? Very convenient...I use mine often. Great for roasts, chicken, soups, even yogurt. Just a reminder: they pack an extra gasket in the box for a good reason. After making several batches of savory foods, I foolishly just washed the top and didn't put in the extra gasket then made yogurt. Mistake! I couldn't palate the onion and garlic yogurt. So when you make delicate tasting foods, like yogurt, remember to switch the gasket. Then put the original one back on for making everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Craig

customer_reviews.title: A revised version would be perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Okay well let me preface this review by saying this pot is better than the InstantPot Ultra, which goes for $30 more. It's so easy to use, and is a wonderful product that deserves every bit of praise that it gets. The enamel of the inner warmer pot chips very easily. Just a simple incorrect placement of the lid can break a piece of the enamel off, which is unfortunate. This doesn't seem to effect the usability of the product, but it sure doesn't make the pot look as pretty after having enamel being chipped. I hope Mealthy will make a revised version! (Which I will buy the moment it comes out probably)
customer_reviews.author: Jire

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that I bought this pot over the instant pot. You get more for your money's worth. I thank Tia Mowry for putting me on to this pot after watching her YouTube video. I'm so glad that I got it on sale which was cheaper than the Canadian Amazon site and the Mealthy website which is Fantastic! I love how quick and easy it is to use this pot- the display is soooooo helpful let's me know the progress of the food. I Definitely Recommend this to anyone look for an overall great pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I would never recommend this product. It really has not worked right since the day it arrived. I used it a few times ok but then it started giving me that pesky “lid” error. I cleaned the lid and the gasket, still gave me the error with the VERY annoying sound. Now it will not pressurize at all, still. I have replaced the gasket. I’m done! Time to buy a different brand! And this one is going in the garbage can!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Not just a great value, but a great product
customer_reviews.text: So I've had this pressure cooker for a couple of weeks now, and have decided that this might be the best kitchen appliance I have purchased. I've made dinner with about half the recipes included and some other found in the internet wilds, and all have been very successful. Particularly the chicken masala. The included accessories have all been handy and necessary so far. It's nice that not all companies will nickle and dime you like some other branded pressure cookers on the market. The unit is an attractive flat black and the included stainless pot is reassuringly heavy and easy to clean. Looking forward to more compliments on supper with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: PaintswithWords

customer_reviews.title: UNBELIEVABLE!
customer_reviews.text: OMGoodness! I do not write reviews on anything but I just had to for the Mealthy! UNBELIEVABLE! The first recipe I made was the mushroom risotto from the app, I didn’t even have all the right ingredients and it was AMAZING! My husband, whose Italian, told me you are talking up this risotto too much-it can’t be that good. One bite and he was speechless. Next I made the egg bites and last steamed clams. EVERY SINGLE CLAM OPENED in the steam bucket on the steam setting for ONE MINUTE! In summary my brother in law and my sister in law are each getting one for Christmas! Thank you MEALTHY! 🙏🏼
customer_reviews.author: Yep...

customer_reviews.title: No Thanks
customer_reviews.text: I just might be one of the few that absolutely DID NOT like the Mealthy Multi Pot 9 Pressure Cooker. It didn't take me long to realize, I was going through a lot of extra steps just to cook a meal, and in fact it was something I could have accomplished in half the time, using regular cooking. The listed time for baking a ham (and a steak) turned them both to brown leather. I returned it for credit. I sincerely hope you have more luck than I did. Let's hear it for tried and true - "how my Mama taught me" cooking. Cook luck :)
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this cooker SO much!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast (in the best way possible). It has cooked everything I have thrown in it perfectly, from a huge pot of stew to an entire dozen eggs. And it is so fast and easy! Throwing something in for dinner last second, pushing two buttons, and being able to do other things knowing it will shut off and keep the food warm when it's done, perfect for a mom of 5! I seriously don't know how I lived without it. And I went with this one over the Instant Pot after reading dozens of reviews from both, very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBleu

customer_reviews.title: High end counter top pressure cooker plus much more.
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived intact and every thing was secured nicely. This product couldn't be any easier to operate. The product is very well made and appears to be high end. I immediately made the recipe for white beans and sage that was provided in the complimentary recipe book. The directions were clear and easy to follow. I did adjust the time to meet my preferences. I highly recommend this product. I also would encourage users to join the Mealthy online community to get many more recipes. This is perfect for busy families or meal prepping.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this kitchen device. The mealthy has saved me time and a lot of headaches. It's really easy to use. I would recommend if you are cooking for more than two to buy another pot so you can and store food for easy clean up and access. I really love the price and I can make yogurt with it! I cooked a 3ft pork loin (cut in pieces to fit in pot) within a hour to pulled pork stage. Even though I was cooking a lot of meat there was consistency in texture and taste. One loin cut wasn't softer or had more flavoring than the other.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Jauregui

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed!!! Never used one before and had a question so I called the customer care number and got a real person at 9:30 am on a Sunday.... Wow! We got things figured out and i was off cooking in it. Really like the App that you can download and everything is coming out perfectly. The display is easy to read and it really helps knowing where you are in the cooking process. (My friend who has a pot from a competitor that didn't have this feature was jealous) Looking forward to enjoying lots of yummy recipes.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: This machine is wonderful! Beans soak overnight then rinse add water and ...i
customer_reviews.text: I never used an electric pressure cooker before I bought this one and I was not sure how well it would work for the way I cook. This machine is wonderful! Beans soak overnight then rinse add water and whatever else you like, push the button, and in 2 hours you have perfect.beans. Saute a roast, add liquid, and push a button to braise. Bone broth . . .easy . . . Done in 4 hours. I have been using it three times a week for 5 months with no issues and love it. t quit working, failed Pressure Sensor - Manufacturer Known Defect
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with the Multipot
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the Multipot. My wife has enjoyed that I'm doing the majority of the cooking now! The saute feature is great to brown ground meat and roasts, then just throw the other ingredients in, set the cook type, and go. Have made various soups, beans, chili, roasts, and chicken dishes with cookbook recipes from Amazon. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Norrid

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: -I was surprised of the quality of this unit. -The inner pot is made of heavy gauge stainless steel with an encapsulated bottom (It is better quality than my kitchen pots). -Super easy to use. -I would recommend this bad boy to anybody. I put 2 racks of baby back ribs in the pot (cut up into 3 rib sections) with some veggies and broth, and pressure cooked it on high for 51 minutes, then broiled them with BBQ sauce for 5 minutes. I could shake the meat off the bones with 2 fingers. This is an amazing unit. My only regret was not buying one a long time ago. Don't delay you have to get one of these babies.
customer_reviews.author: walter collins

customer_reviews.title: Why didnt I know this??!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are an older person...please wait till they fix the display....hopefully. You cant see anything unless you have your glasses and a bright flashlight. The buttons are not back lit and hard to read. I love the machine just wish it was more user friendly, thats why the 2 star rating. If another one pot comes out with back lighting, this one is a goner.
customer_reviews.author: Sunce95

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Addition To Our Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: It is no wonder there are so many raving reviews! The first meal we tried was a mixed dry bean and ham soup. In just a little over an hour we had a delicious meal without having to wait for beans to soak. There are so many scrumptious healthy menus that we are looking forward to try. The multi pot is so easy to use and clean and adds so much flexibility to our kitchen. This was an early Christmas present to ourselves so that we would have it available to prepare for a house full of Thanksgiving guests!
customer_reviews.author: leeNcopa

customer_reviews.title: If you’re used to the old model stick with it
customer_reviews.text: Had the first version and the app and it was a great combination, the new features need the app updated to reflect the difference in the appliances, I went off other reviews that said this is nicer I liked the older model better and felt it was simple and easy to use .
customer_reviews.author: a9875ijgfkjhea943

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and spend a month between blogs, forums and videos and searched for the best pressure cooker/slow cooker that would fill my expectations. Not only the price was great, the nice looking finish, but the user friendly and the 9 in 1 functions were what really convinced me for buying the mealthy multipot. And I’m absolutely happy with my purchase. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CarolM

customer_reviews.title: Love my multipot
customer_reviews.text: Love my multipot. I can use insta pot recipes for the most part. I have made amazing fall of the bone ribs, the best potato salad, chicken an dumplings and CHEESE CAKE all UNDER an hour from beginning of prep to table /fridge. The potato salad, even the eggs go In the pot with potatoes . Seriously!! And delicious. My picky eater boyfriend loves these dishes. Just need to get a recipe book with quick recipes with less the 10 ingredients. I got this to save time which it does but a lot of recipes have tons of ingredients. There is one out there, havent bought yet.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Clark

customer_reviews.title: Wow, how great is this...
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this would become another too good to be true unit that would end up being stored in the garage. Nope. It stays in a large kitchen cabinet since we use it 2 or 3 times a week. Pot roast, pulled pork, flank steak are great in this. Sometimes it needs an extra half hour than the recipe called for, so we just start with that now. Blew my mind when the Risotto turned out better than the stove top stir for 45 minute version. Lots of great recipes online at "Dad Cooks Dinner". So happy we bought this !
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hanson

customer_reviews.title: 8qt Super happy!
customer_reviews.text: 3 reasons to why I chose Mealthy over Instant Pot, with the research in comparison of the 2, customer service stood out loud and clear, Instant Pot- horrible!, Mealthy- excellent! #2 I love the progress indicator which Instant Pot/others do not have. #3 I love not following the crowd, just because the brand, Instant Pot, is very popular, doesn’t mean it’s a better product. I bought the Crispy Lid as well, awesome! Mealthy MultiPot, has proven to be one of the best investments I have made. 👊🏻💥
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Start eating at home again!
customer_reviews.text: We have finally stopped eating out so much. Thanks to the ease of use of the Mealthy Multipot and their wonderful app. There are a lot of wonderful easy to cook recipes that take a lot less time to prepare than a traditionally cooked meal. The Mealthy Multipot is very easy to use. Oh the joys of home cooking again! If your on the fence about getting one just do it. Comes with steamer basket that other brands don’t include as well.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service ever!
customer_reviews.text: There’s not a bad thing I can say about this brand. I’ve had it for a year now and have purchased other items from Mealthy. Customer service is unparalleled! The owner is active on their Facebook page and personally answered questions. You won’t regret buying this brand!
customer_reviews.author: TJMHAWK

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: were going through a remodel so cooking has been tough has been difficult some times, specially when its getting late and you still have to clean up mess so we bought this to try to help OMG,, this thing is amazing, and makes food taste so good beef stroganoff was the best I ever had and cooked in 12 minutes potato soup 12 minutes awesome I read a lot of reviews really happy with this pressure cooker
customer_reviews.author: loren gray

customer_reviews.title: BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE I HAVE EVER ENCOUNTERED
customer_reviews.text: I bought my wife one of these things and she fell inlove with it. I work out of town. When I got home she cooked with it and it was bad A_s! So I bought a second one to take with me on the road. It quit after one use. It was a Friday night at like 9 pm when I sent them an email.... before the weekend was up they had another one at my house and told me to send back the other one whenever I could. THATS GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE..... the one I carry with me at work rides around in the back of my truck in a blue tote..... still works great.
customer_reviews.author: bobby fields

customer_reviews.title: Most awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love the Mealthy pot! I have just finished the first batch of long cooked bone broth. There was no odor from the process in my home, no excess steam in the kitchen and the broth is fabulous! I am sold on that alone. The pot originally arrived without the power cord (unusual and rare) and the company was more than speedy inits response and in getting a cord to me--responded on the weekend and cord arrived 2 or 3 days later. Thank you so much, Mealthy Pot! I will definietly buy these for my kids ad recommend them to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Mori Jo Montagne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing kitchen gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Cooking dry beans from scratch in 1 hour (15 mins for the pressure to build up + 45 mins of actual cooking time) compared to 2 hours on the stove is great! I've never used a multipot/instant pot before but the instructions that come with this make it very easy to literally throw anything in and start cooking huge amounts of food for days. Amazing for meal prepping. I'd definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: It's changed my life!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pot! I'm not crazy about cooking all the time, but have to in order to lose weight and keep lean. The Mealthy pot is so easy to use. I throw the ingredients in, start it, then take dishes out of the dishwasher or whatever chores need to be done while my food is cooking. It helps me easily meal prep for the week and I can make quick, delicious meals for my husband in no time! It is a great product and price. It's probably the best thing I've purchased in years!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Game changer in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite new acquisition in the kitchen. Both my husband and I love the functionality and the speed and ease of using those. Artichokes take about 21 minutes, but if you were boiling them they would take about an hour and 15 minutes. That’s how much time it saves you. Also makes excellent price. The controls are easy to use and there’s so many great recipes on Google. I highly recommend this. It’s a game changer in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: GoGirlGo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Just received our Mealthy Pot yesterday. Unwrapped it and followed the instructions before I started to cook. Beautiful pot and great accessories. *Take note the measuring cup is a rice cup measurement and is not your regular cup size (see pamphlet photo). I made the Mealthy "chicken spaghetti" and it was fabulous. Looking forward to many great meals. Great recipe book and app. Easy instructions. My husband and I are happy campers 😁 I made the chicken tortilla soup and the chicken tortellini soup from the enclosed recipe book. All came out beautifully. Love this appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Els Williams

customer_reviews.title: I would like to share you my GOOD NEWS about this MULTI-POT(9-1) ...
customer_reviews.text: I would like to share you my GOOD NEWS about this MULTI-POT(9-1) product. Super WOW! I have cooked dinner last night using MP. Wow, it was delicious. Unbelievable good stuff!!! This MP product in my opinion will outshine all of the other pressure cookers. I was impressed by the integrity of the design, easy of use, quality, usability, rich resources and etc etc...the list goes on and on and on Of your MT product...................!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Multipot may be my new go-to method of cooking and I'm 74 years old.
customer_reviews.text: Just got My Multipot a couple of days, but so far, it's looking great! I have never owned a pressure cooker. I made beef stew in it last night and it was delicious! Allow a little more time than expected because the pre heat took about ten mins, then it said afterward to let it naturally vent....took another 8 or so minutes...then it recommended letting it set for ten mins. So all together from starting prep of chopped items till ready to serve was about an hour and a half. Not bad tho' just have to remember to allow for these extras. Can't wait to try some more recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Wynn S.

customer_reviews.title: Good - Can Use 6 qt. Instant Pot bowl, Nylon seals
customer_reviews.text: Good Pressure cooker. I had a Instant Pod before but was old and it was cheap so there wasn't to much stuff on it even in manual mode. But what I try was to check the bowl from 6 qt. Instant Pod and It was the same as this Mealthy MultiPot comes with. Now I Have extra Bowl.And the Nylon Seal is also same as Instant Pot. Right now I'm doing Lamb Pilaf and I hope will come out good. It did come out good. Rice was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Way better than instapot.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my Mealthy. Browns well, easy to see what's happening because of front display, red steam top easy to read, great directions, shortcuts and ideas inside the box. Was skeptical about cooking pasta, turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: _t0ni_

customer_reviews.title: Mealthy Customer service is the best
customer_reviews.text: This pot is great for making so many things. I struggled between getting a Mealthy Multipot or an Instant Pot. So many recipes for the Instantpot, but they work on the Multipot too. The best part of this is that we had a mishap and got the pot wet and a couple of weeks later it stopped working. We contacted Mealthy and they sent us a new one. We had it in 3 days. Great customer service, I will always recommend Mealthy over Instantpot because it works great and customer service is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: mlandy

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. Have done a large batch of apple sauce. A batch of rice and today a pot full of chicken broth. I had a Fagor, before this one and tossed it in the trash. I got tired of trying to get parts and never could get customer service on the phone! Today I called MultiPot for help in getting the gasket out. Two rings and got great advice. I particularly like the weight of the stainless (inside) pot. I say go for it! July 11, 2018 Update: Something has gone wrong with the timer. I can't depend on it. It makes the unit hard to use. Not dependable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: The app (which is also fabulous and free if you want to check it out before) has easy and yummy recipes too
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredible! It has revolutionized my mealprepping. I purchased this instead of the instant pot because it came with an extra gasket and silicone mitts. Totally worth it! I use one gasket for savory dishes, and one for yogurt making (nobody wants carnita flavored yogurt!!). I highly reccomend if you have been on the fence about Instantpot vs mealthy. The app (which is also fabulous and free if you want to check it out before) has easy and yummy recipes too! Just put in a dish, pressure cook it, and keep on with your meal prepping!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison J.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have Pot
customer_reviews.text: I've been avoiding buying another kitchen appliance but when I found myself in need of a new stove, I took the opportunity to buy the Mealthy Pot while I waited for my new stove to get delivered. This pot is Amazing - for starters you can practically make anything with this pot, it's reasonably priced and as an added bonus it comes with a handful of utinsil accessories. Certainly the most useful [and utilized] kitchen appliance that I own.
customer_reviews.author: iae85

customer_reviews.title: It has a permanent home on my countertop!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Mealthy Pot!!! I only used it twice but both dishes were absolutely incredible! I made bbq pulled pork that was so flavorful and tender you'd swear I'd been slaving all day (start to finish 1 hour). And don't get me started on those pork tamales. It's crazy what you can do with pork roast cubes and taco seasoning packs! I love the fact that there is no stirring or constantly checking the food. The saute feature is a beast. It browns meat so perfectly and evenly. Can't wait to try more features!
customer_reviews.author: babyplanets81

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby back ribs every time!
customer_reviews.text: What a time saver! Making a meal after work is truly easier with this pressure cooker. Stuffed with chicken wings are cooked in 10 minutes. Our favorite dish is now baby back ribs. Cooks 1-1/2 slabs in 27-37 minutes, place cooked ribs on cookie sheet, apply favorite bbq sauce and broil 5-6 minutes in the oven. Some of the best ribs you have ever eaten. Best of all, you made them! Very consistent cooking. IMO, worth every penny for perfect ribs alone. Wish I had bought one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M., White Lake  MI

customer_reviews.title: Time saver! Cooks amazing and very user friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing cooker! It was the first time I ever cooked ribs in under an hour and turned out tender (Just remove membrane first before throwing them in for 45 min). Just keep in mind it takes about 10 minutes to warm up before the timer starts. My wife was skeptical but now she is realizing what a great unit this is especially for families with no time to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wright

customer_reviews.title: What’s a stove?
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used my stovetop much since getting this. I was about to buy the Instant Pot duo but this seemed like so much more for the same price. You can take any IP recipe and use it in this. I’ve made cheesecake, ribs, hard boiled eggs, pot roast chicken recipes, thawed hamburger, potatoes and eggs at the same time for potato salad and make soups. My husband prefers me not to make meat in the slow cooker as it dries out but not in the MultiPot. Mealthy seems dedicated to keep their customers happy. use their app and and like their fb community Page.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: EASY to use and great value LOVE my MultiPot!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my new MultiPot!! It is so easy to use. I really needed to replace and upgrade my slow cooker so I looked at a number of pressure cookers. I made the right choice with the MultiPot. I am trying to end the last minute fast food stop but don't always plan dinner. The MultiPot makes it easy to cook a last minute healthy, great tasting meal my kids will eat. I really like the digital progress indicator which lets me know how soon dinner will be ready. The accessories that it came with are a great value. I especially like the bright pot holders which make getting the hot food out so easy.
customer_reviews.author: LindaCH

customer_reviews.title: Best value in multipots.
customer_reviews.text: Pot arrived on time and intact. Thus far, the product has worked flawlessly. "Instapot" branded recipes seen online may be used with this pot with little or no adjustment or recalibration. Pot was thoughtfully packaged and the inclusion of multiple accessories made this pot a better buy than the competition. Be advised: app does not control pot and there is no wifi functionality. Very pleased with the build quality, performance, and bright and clear LCD screen.
customer_reviews.author: WakeThe Machines

customer_reviews.title: Great for truck drivers!
customer_reviews.text: I’m the wife of an over the road truck driver, and this little cooker is perfect for EVERYTHING! I tested out a few recipes already, and oh my God, everyone LOVED them! The app is great too. I only recommend you buy a pan for it, since you can also cook pizza, lasagna and cakes in it too, but you’ll need a pan. I just used an instant pot brand pan for mine. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Birria and frijoles de la Hoya!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! I’ve made Birria a few times since I’ve bought it and it’s a hit! I use my own recipes however, I have needed guidance with the times I should pressure cook different meats. I use less water than having made this in a traditional pot. I also get carried away studying so by the time I have to pick up the kids I forget to make dinner. THIS has helped a lot by cutting time in half!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted about a year, slowly died with heavy use.
customer_reviews.text: My Mealthy died, the Instant Pot that inspired it's purchase is still going strong, at least the accessories and pots are compatible so I can still use them. This is probably "stolen IP" made in China without the same quality control, lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN SLAUGHTER

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING!!!  (updated... happy now)
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review..... Multipot stopped working after a few weeks..... something electronic... kind of flashed and sputtered and kept turning off...... Customer support responded right away and sent a replacement within days. Very Happy with my Multipot.... Makes rice perfectly....What I love is I can cook my rice inside a ceramic bowl inserted into the pot using the included stand and a little water on the bottom. I serve the rice right out of the bowl.... no clean up ...I also like the electronic graph in front that gives you an idea where it is in the cooking process. Stainless steel pot cleans up wonderfully. Thank you Mealthy.... great customer support. !
customer_reviews.author: Diane D. Gonsiorowski

customer_reviews.title: You will use this- it’s easy& really performs
customer_reviews.text: I know there are many favorable reviews on this product- so suffice to say, I love it, it is great, it is easy to use& easy to clean. Old fashioned pressure cookers were scary, but this is nothing like those old ones. I use it multiple times per week, I don’t even put it away. It’s the best cooking device I’ve ever had. We are eating better than ever, I can come home from work& create a fabulous dinner in 40m or less. I made short ribs& beef barley stew for thanksgiving, they were a huge hit. My mashed potatoes were the best I’ve ever made...... I LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: berrysherbit

customer_reviews.title: This thing works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have use this multi pot for a week and a half now and I am really impressed with it. I have made beef stew in it, corn beef and cabbage, rice, oatmeal and several other things. They have all come out tasting wonderful. I would totally recommend this to a friend. I had some questions about operating the Multi pot and called customer service they are fantastic no run around and answered the phone on my first call
customer_reviews.author: Damworker

customer_reviews.title: A big help in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my Mealthy weekly and it has been a hit in my house. Very easy-to-use buttons and instructions have been helpful. One thing I've noticed with other units is the long time it takes to get up to pressure; it takes a few minutes but hasn't been an issue. Easy to clean, which I appreciate. Came well packed and the phone app gives good information. Overall very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: The is really a sturdy appliance, quite heavy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased a different brand which arrived DOA. I did more research after returning the other unit and found the MultiPot. The is really a sturdy appliance, quite heavy and well made. I unpacked it, put it through its self-test, and thought about what to try first. As it comes with a vegetable steamer and I had some asparagus, that seemed a good place to start. Appliance performed flawlessly. It is easy to use and the quick start guide is actually useful as is the app. I highly recommend the MultiPot.
customer_reviews.author: Froglips

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: First time ever purchasing and after reading about other brands, I chose Multipot! I'm so happy I did. First, the extras that come with it, like the extra gasket to switch between savory or sweet, is fantastic. Made a leg of lamb, boneless, and switched gaskets to the red, to make yogurt! Within 5 minutes of emailing customer service with a question about natural release, I received the perfect answer. No extra accessories needed, as this one is complete. You' lol never need another brand. I'd give it 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using pressure cookers and canners for awhile now and this unit doesn't disappoint. Super easy to use, much easier than the older dial or weighted units, sleek user friendly digital controls make it almost foolproof. I really like the delayed start and automatic keep warm features. Everything seems to be made sturdy and well thought out. Just read the directions, I do the recommended water test, you too just may fall in love. The picture is of my first dish, 15 minute bbq pulled chicken thighs for sliders, yum!!
customer_reviews.author: T Miller

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice pressure cooker for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it comes up to pressure very quick. What I dislike is that it takes longer to cook than my instant pot. Overall, it is a nice pressure cooker for beginners. I have more than 20 years using pressure cookers, and I know which one works best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with stellar customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a year ago but have to write a review now because the customer service has been amazing. The multipot is easy to use and comes with plenty of accessories, which would usually cost extra with other brands. Half a year in, my son turned on the insinkerator and inadvertently demolished the steam vent handle. It was our fault, yet the customer service offered to send us a replacement free. They were incredibly responsive.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kuo

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. Easy to use. Put a whole pork shoulder in and cooked n 2 hours vs 10 in a crock pot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Such a fantastic product if you like to cook and especially cook healthy!
customer_reviews.text: This Mealthy pressure cooker pot is so great to cook in and does so many cool things! The product came swiftly, great packaging, easy instructions and easy to use. I am a vegan so always looking for foods and products that will help me eat and cook healthy. This does all that and more! What is extremely valuable is the very slick, cool Mealthy app! This has so many recipes, grocery list, photos, videos and more. Mealthy has really done a wonderful job making this easy and fun to use. A fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing MultiPot!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Mealthy MultiPot!!! Fully cooked and delicious roasts, soups, etc... In just a fraction of the normal cooking time. I have cooked many meals since I got my Mealthy MultiPot and my family is really enjoying all of the recipes I'm trying. This really is an awesome kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jdrymon

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: In regards to the materials, they are good as can be expected from the brand. What disappointed me was the fact that it doesn't cook the food as well as other pressure cookers. In more than one occasion the meals have been undercooked, even when following both the instructions and recipes to the letter.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Well we decided on General Tso's Chicken and WOW was it amazing & fast
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my pot last week after a friend of mine told me about it, got it on Monday & then spent the next couple of days trying to decide what I was going to cook in it! Well we decided on General Tso's Chicken and WOW was it amazing & fast, fast, fast, longest part was prepping it all to go in the pot! When I did the quick release I think I did scare the crap out of my dog though! I'm very excited to decide on what I am going to make in it next... will definitely recommend this to others for sure!
customer_reviews.author: C Loving

customer_reviews.title: Like the looks!
customer_reviews.text: My friend has purchased around five of the original Instapots. I went with this brand instead because of its looks. Very happy with it, but just haven’t quite bonded with it yet. Wish it had more recipes included with it as I get tired of looking up recipes on line. I tried a brownie dessert, which was a total flop. Chickens liked it though. :). Meats seem to be the best and most successful for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: KD Roach

customer_reviews.title: Defective Multipot
customer_reviews.text: This multipot is defective. It doesnt recognize the lid so it just continuously beeps and flashes the word "lid". It's frustrating because this has even happened midway through slow cooking my meal. I can't just program and leave it to do its thing, I have to be around to constantly watch it. It is frustrating. Other than this, I think the product is okay.
customer_reviews.author: trendy1

customer_reviews.title: EVERYONE NEEDS ONE!
customer_reviews.text: I waited way too long to get one of these. I bought this one because it was less expensive than the Insta and had a lot of accessories. I have never cooked with an Insta, so I don't know how they compare. I just know that this one is awesome. I cooked a 4 ingredient pot roast last night in just over an hour. From beginning to end. I am just going to get rid of my slow cooker. I was never able to think ahead often enough to use it that much anyway. With this, my lack of preparation and foresight is no longer a burden.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It has changed my entire dinner experience. I love it so much I use it everyday! It sautés, it boils, and it defrosts! Among everything else. I can boil eggs in 5 minutes, cook rice in 10 minutes, make a baked potatoes in 10 minutes. It’s my favorite thing to use and I haven’t stopped since purchase. I’m there is a learning curve but you’ll get there with use. Also you must buy the air fryer lid. It’s a total game changers
customer_reviews.author: Spaalla

customer_reviews.title: I use it everyday. Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday. It's absolutely perfect. You can tell they really put effort into the design, functionality, programming, and the packet of cooking material and instructions it came with. I'm really impressed! Edit: Almost a year later, I am still using it very often, and it still works great, however, there is a thin film of plastic that covers the buttons on the front, and it has warped a little, but it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Arre iiSYSii

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in August of 2018. I used it maybe three or four times since the purchase. I attempted to use it a couple of days ago. To my dismay, it did not work! I called Customer Support. They suggested a remedy by checking the power connection. I wiggled the connection and the pot immediately powered on! What a wonderful experience! I’ll try to use it again and see how well it works!
customer_reviews.author: JayPeeR2

customer_reviews.title: Love it , Love it Mealthy 8qt Multi Pot
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely skeptical but after making my meal I am over joyed with this product. I was able to brown my roast (pork) in olive oil and garlic, then after the saute time I placed my mixture of fresh farm carrots, red potatoes, white potatoes and onions in the steam tray cover and cook for 1 hour and I am telling you something that was moist, tender and tasty is truly a dream factor especially cooking roast. Thank you for this great product and I can't wait to try the Mealthy CrispLid and am thinking about purchasing another one for my daughter. God Bless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Many Things to Make with It
customer_reviews.text: I love my Mealthy MultiPot. I have made Greek yogurt several times, and it always turns out wonderful. I've used it as a pressure cooker, slow cooker, soup maker, and warmer. I use it a couple of times a week, so it is the one appliance I keep on my counter top. There are a lot of recipes specifically for the Mealthy Pot on the internet so it is very easy to find something to make in your Pot. I highly recommend this for those who are looking for a reasonably prices electric pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Easyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Wow love this MultiPot.
customer_reviews.text: I love this MultiPot! Now the family is in for a couple of weeks, I’ll be putting it to the test! I’d rather be with my family than in The kitchen..and can’t wait to show off a couple of meals. Thank for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Earthgirl

customer_reviews.title: This is the best addition to my kitchen-ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best addition to my kitchen-ever!!! I love this thing. The ease of use is amazing! This has been such a lifesaver. This is the pressure cooker for you-don't let those two words scare you. I could blow up boiled eggs....and I haven't messed up anything in this pot. PS I'm obviously still alive!
customer_reviews.author: DJP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works great. I've wanted and instant pot for a long time and decided on the mealthy. There is a slight learning curve to using this product but I was up and running in no time. Currently, I use it mostly for eggs and rice although I have tried other items. Meats come out tender; vegetables, well, a little overdone (the learning curve) but got it right the 2nd time.
customer_reviews.author: Mar Mu

product_meta.title: Mealthy MultiPot 9-in-1 Programmable Pressure Cooker 6 Quarts with Stainless Steel Pot, Steamer Basket, instant access to recipe app. Pressure cook, slow cook, sauté, rice cooker, yogurt, steam
feature_bullets: 9 Appliances in 1: Cook meals in mere minutes & in less than half the time Also get instant access to our recipes! Pressure cook, slow cook, sauté, steam, make cakes, pasteurize, make yogurt, cook rice, and Warm, all in one electric appliance. Comes with a 1-year manufacturer's - register your appliance on the Healthy website.
2 dishes at once & stainless steel pot: The included stainless-steel steamer basket enables you to make two dishes at once! The big cooking pot is also stainless steel!
14 easy-touch cooking programs: poultry, meat/stew, Bean/Chili, Soup, sauté/simmer, cake, rice, Multigrain, Porridge, Steam, slow cook, keep Warm, yogurt, and pressure cook (manual setting).
We've thought of everything: an extra silicone gasket, silicone mitts, steamer basket, 4cm-raised steam rack/trivet, Ladle, rice paddle, and measuring cup are all included!
Recipes and videos on Healthy mobile app: The Healthy site and mobile app for iOS and Android feature thousands of recipes and step-by-step videos to make the most out of every Healthy appliance!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,199 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
